comments.body: Really?  Surprsied we don't want them to check it in.  Eventually we'll want that.
i believe all these prints should be replaced by logging calls -- see the other files for code to copy to do that

Yeah, I was confused by what to use. init.dart was using regular print statements. But it was not clear which logging variants to use. I wish there was a simple method to log to either stdout or stderr
nit: global nit - flutter style arbitrarily recommends using `'` instead of `"` for strings.
analyzer will complain about excessive braces in interpolation here and above and below

shouldn't that be 1 rather than -1?

(-1 is going to signal to the shell that there's been a crash, no?)

(applies to all error code returns)
We should probably prefer `dart:io` functions where they exist, over shelling out. So, `new Directory(directory).deleteSync(recurse: true)`.

We might instead ignore `.gitignore/Generated/` in the top level git ignore file created in the `create` command. There's also a path there and in the `.analysis_options` file that should be updated w/ the new ios paths.
